response.job_title: Project Manager | PMO | Scrum | Digital Transformation | Machine Learning | AI
response.summary:
Industry 4.0 Technologies Project Manager, well versed in Agile and waterfall methodologies, with +5 years of experience thriving in fast-paced environments on highly visible projects and initiatives. Collaborating
with cross functional of 5 to 20+ team members in diverse industries.
response.skills: Scaled Agile Framework (SAFe), Kanban, Large Scaled Scrum (LeSS), Ciclo de vida de desarrollo de software (SDLC), Planificación del sprint, Gestión de mantenimiento, Mantenimiento de plantas industriales, Innovación tecnológica, Ingeniería de proyectos, Gestión de proyectos en cascada, Gestión de presupuestos, Transformación digital, Gestión operativa, Mejora de procesos de negocio, Startup, Gestión de proyectos, Planificación de proyectos, Gestión de partes interesadas, Gestión de riesgos, Liderazgo de equipos

profile_positions.description:
- End-to-end software projects ownership of projects in highpressure and variable environments, including simultaneous fullstack web services deployments in several geographies.
- Sprint planning, burn-down management, stakeholders management. Prioritization and resource allocation.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Planning, monitoring, control and auditory of major industrial projects in food industry.
•	Stakeholders management, communications plan, risk management.
•	PMO documents and processes improvement and standardizing
profile_positions.title: Project Planner

profile_positions.description:
•	Ensure high performance operative KPIs, efficiency, budget, while leading and developing empowered and efficient teams.
•	Key Achievement: Designed, developed, implemented, tested and integrated software tools to automatize operations procedures and improve regional efficiency by 70%.
profile_positions.title: Operations Manager

profile_positions.description: •	Key Achievement: Design, execution and commissioning of an innovation and saving project, optimizing operational and logistics processes , reducing raw materials lead time by 50%
profile_positions.title: Project Engineer

profile_positions.description: •	Key Achievement: Designed, executed and commissioned of a utilities project, deployed in 1 month, exceeding performance and savings goal by 15%.
profile_positions.title: Maintenance Team Leader and Planner

company.name: MIGSO-PCUBED
company.description:
EN // MIGSO-PCUBED is the world’s leading consultancy dedicated to project, programme, portfolio and change management.

We have become the trusted delivery partner of the most recognisable brands in Aeronautics, Defense, Automotive, Transport, Financial Services, and Energy as well as Government organisations, helping them convert their big ideas into reality.


FR // MIGSO-PCUBED est le leader mondial du conseil en Management de Projets et PMO.
Nous sommes une filiale du Groupe ALTEN depuis 2003.

Aujourd’hui, MIGSO-PCUBED est une entreprise de conseil unique d’envergure internationale, proposant une offre de service globale end-to-end à forte valeur ajoutée en terme de Management de Projet et PMO.
MIGSO-PCUBED accompagne les projets de R&D, d’IT et de Transformation de ses clients industriels, institutionnels et de la finance.
